title: Warrior woman

properties.name: description
properties.value: Warrior women are human female warriors found scattered across RuneScape. They are similar in level and stats to male guards, but are comparatively very rarely killed due to their drops. Warrior women are a much less crowded alternative to killing guards. There are two in the East Ardougne Castle. There are some in Varrock Castle, and there are also four at a camp to the north-west of Ardougne which are almost never used. This camp also offers safespots for ranged and mage.

Monster ID3260

Warrior women are human female warriors found scattered across RuneScape. They are similar in level and stats to male guards, but are comparatively very rarely killed due to their drops. Warrior women are a much less crowded alternative to killing guards. There are two in the East Ardougne Castle. There are some in Varrock Castle, and there are also four at a camp to the north-west of Ardougne which are almost never used. This camp also offers safespots for ranged and mage.

They may be pickpocketed at level 25 Thieving, giving 18 coins and 26 Thieving experience, and getting hit for 2 hitpoints if the pickpocket fails. Warrior women are an infrequently used alternative to thieving from stalls at lower levels. This method is useful in Ardougne due to their closeness to a food source, the Ardougne Baker's Stall. As with guards, knights, and paladins, warrior women can be lured into buildings to be pickpocketed easily.
